contents.text: Thank you for calling Sendwithus in San Francisco, your partner in crafting exceptional email experiences that drive growth.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m having trouble with my email templates and need technical support to fix the rendering issue.
I need technical assistance to fix an integration error preventing my email campaigns from sending.
I need to troubleshoot our email API integration—my transactional messages are returning 500 errors.
I forgot my password and need help resetting it so I can access my account.
I’m having issues with my API integration and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account team.

navigationGoals: I need to update my payment details and review my current subscription billing.
I want to review my latest invoice and update my payment method for my account.
I want to update my payment method and download last month’s invoice for accounting.
I’d like to update the credit card on file for my billing.
I need to update my billing details and clarify my invoice charges.

contents.text: For sales and information on our email marketing solutions, press 2.
To schedule a product demo, press 1.
One moment please, we’re connecting you to someone to schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a product demo of your email marketing solution.
I'd like to schedule a demo of your email marketing solution to evaluate it for my veteran outreach program.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your email segmentation and automation features.
I’m interested in scheduling a live demonstration of your email marketing platform.
I’d like to arrange a walkthrough of Sendwithus to see how it fits our marketing needs.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with a sales representative about pricing plans and enterprise features.
I need to speak with a sales rep to discuss pricing and plan options for scaling my deployment.
I’d like to talk to a sales specialist about enterprise pricing and high-volume plans.
I want to speak with someone about plan pricing and which option suits me.
I want to speak directly with a sales specialist about enterprise email solutions.
